import { Container } from '../../style'; const TipsTeacherApplication = () => { return (

Review Process:

Once you have created a teachers account at our website, you will have to submit a Teacher Application for our team to have an idea on who you are and what you want to teach. To help you with that, here are some traits that we are looking for in a Tagpros teacher:

  • Experts in the field they want to teach
  • Experienced with handling young learners
  • Have excellent verbal and written communication skills

 

After receiving your teacher application, we will check the supporting materials and respond to you within 3-5 business days. You can reapply if your initial application was rejected. You may submit up to three times. Here are some suggestions from us on how to write a strong teacher application:

  • Always check your spelling and grammar. This will help us determine if you have the necessary communication skills to become a great Tagpros teacher.
  • Give specific information. You want us to understand as much as possible about why we ought to select you as a teacher on our platform. To ensure that the information you wish to emphasize are read by our team, you should strive to be as specific as you can in your writing.
  • Prepare a great sample video. The sample video will be the most important part of your application. This will be the one that will give us the most idea about your capabilities as a teacher. We have created a{' '} guide {' '} that can help you creat a great sample class for your teacher application.
); }; export default TipsTeacherApplication;
